Name: Vanduul Scythe
Description:
Manufacturer: Esperia
Focus: Medium Fighter

Fast becoming the symbol of the Vanduul Race, the Scythe is the foot soldier in every raid and the target of every human fighter pilot. Featuring a hefty weapons payload, the Scythe's real asset is its maneuverability, found in the twin main and twelve maneuvering thrusters. This captured Vanduul-made Scythe has been modified by Esperia to be flyable by Human pilots.
